name: Death-Bringer | Book 1: Shadows of the Gods

metadata.description: Death-Bringer is M.S. Bourland's debut novel and the first book in the Shadows of the Gods series, a mythology-inspired epic set in Bronze Age Greece.Shadows of the Gods is a limited-edition NFT series that includes original artwork, physical books and token-gated access to a professional audiobook & selected eBook formats at shadowsbook.xyz. Silver-tier holders receive a full-color original artwork by Cr24ti7e, a paperback edition of Death-Bringer & digital access to the eBook & audiobook.
metadata.name: Death-Bringer | Silver
